column4: anyone know whats up with firefox and gray boxes for flash? Flash works fine in Opera.

I had a big problem with Flash. The solution was... well... nothing... I installed Gnash and it worked... after I installed Opera and it worked with both (Flash and Gnash)... I removed Gnash and for some reason... I don't know why... it (flash) is working in FF now

Over all I'd say Ibex is complete garbage. Not only does flash go in and out my pcm keeps randomly getting muted. My external HDD keeps getting corrupted. My USB device won't mount some times and on top of all that it randomly freezes on me.
